Room.Name: Leviathan Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Leviathan Drive, between the Rodaisl Complex and the Shrine.
Room.LongDescription: The Rodaisl Community Housing Complex is located on the east side of the road, providing housing to thousands of Oceancrest citizens. Individual houses cannot be built inside the city due to the large population and the confining City Walls. The compromise was the construction of two Housing Complexes to house the citizens of Oceancrest within the safety of the City Walls.
